history.content:
Berkeley StEP applications (Spring 2020) are now open! Last info session is tomorrow and apps due in 2 days!

 

Berkley StEP is an 10-week experiential program that connects UC Berkeley engineering, computer science, business, design, and law students to help them try a real founder experience. 

Who is it for?

Individual Students or Teams, from every background, with or without an idea, who look for a team to build an MVP and create a business model, get ready to apply to accelerators and to pitch to investors.

How does it work?

You can apply as a team or as an individual; depending on your preference, you are matched with other people/ideas. Teams meet all together once a week, Thursday 6:30-9:30pm (starting Feb. 27). Each team is assigned a Coach that helps set up milestones/deadlines and a Mentor specific for the needs of the team. 

Some stats about previous editions:

  • +$1M raised in the first two editions

  • 60+ startups launched through Berkeley StEP 

  • 500+ applicants from more than 5 schools around Berkeley 

  • Exclusive access to a unique pool of mentors and resources 

How to apply?

Please complete your application via this link by Feb. 20. For more info, please connect to step.berkeley.edu 

Application will be reviewed on a rolling basis, thus we strongly advise you to apply as early as possible. 

Want to learn more?

We will be holding the following info sessions + mixers:

  • Haas School of Business: 

    • Info session 1: N340 + N344 February 12th 1pm to 2pm

    • Info session 2: N340 + N344 February 18th 7pm to 8pm

  • Engineering School:

    • Info session 1: Cory Courtyard February 11th 6pm to 8 pm

If you have any questions, please feel free to send an email at berkeleystep@berkeley.edu
history.subject: Join the Berkeley StEP Pre-Acceleration Program in Spring 2020!
